sqlMap.select: SELECT OFFER_CATLG_LOC_ID offerCatlgLocId, PROD_OFFER_ID prodOfferId, DIR_ID dirId, ocl.CATALOG_ITEM_ID catalogItemId, CATALOG_ITEM_CD catalogItemCd FROM OFFER_CATALOG_LOCATION ocl LEFT JOIN CATALOG_ITEM ci ON ci.CATALOG_ITEM_ID = ocl.CATALOG_ITEM_ID WHERE PROD_OFFER_ID=#prodOfferId# and tenant_id=#tenantId#
